Secondary School
pages.text: $(br)After you master a single school of magic, you can choose to study a $(key)secondary school$(). To do so, you need to craft certain magical items as the foundation for that school.$(br2)$(welcome/emi#search)Search$() for $(copy:#trinkets:chest/secondary_school)#trinkets:chest/secondary_school$() to view the related items.
